name: Pull Yourself Together (Bardic Studios, Koicrow, Josh Marlowe)
name_original: Pull Yourself Together (Bardic Studios, Koicrow, Josh Marlowe)
description:
Finding someBODY to love

After tumbling into a labyrinthine cavern, you have literally fallen to pieces. With any luck (and a bit of fumbling), you'll be able to Pull Yourself Together and ultimately make your escape.

You are what you eat collect

We've incorporated a dynamic Active Ragdoll system that allows the movement mechanism to evolve as you collect more body parts. This system is geared to enable ANY combination of body parts. Unfortunately we spent so much time doing this that we don't actually get to show off what it can do... 

Controls

Arrow Keys & Mouse - That's all you need to know.

Credits 

--NO EXTERNAL ASSETS USED--

Concept by Joshua Marlowe, Louis Dutton, and KoiCrow
Art by KoiCrow
Programming by Joshua Marlowe and Louis Dutton
Music/Audio by Louis Dutton
